/node_modules/foo/index.js(1,1): error TS2304: Cannot find name 'exports'.


==== /a.ts (0 errors) ====
    import foo from "foo";
    foo.bar();
    
==== /node_modules/foo/index.js (1 errors) ====
    exports.default = { bar() { return 0; } }
    ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'exports'.
